ComicInfo.Series: Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time: The Eye of the World
ComicInfo.Summary:
In a risky attempt to get to the Eye of the World, Moiraine has talked the Loial into taking the group to The Ways - mystical transportation aids tainted by darkness. It's a risk the Ogier is uncomfortable with, but that Moiraine sees as necessary... especially after the Dark One again visits the dreams of Rand, Mat, and Perrin. Time is running out for our heroes in the latest installment of Robert Jordan's THE WHEEL OF TIME: THE EYE OF THE WORLD!
